General.Name: Transition Evergreen
General.Description: Transition Evergreen SA is an infrastructure fund specializing in SMEs focused on the ecological transition. The firm focuses on accelerating the ecological transition and reducing the carbon footprint. The funds invest in unlisted French and European companies.
